На опубликованных в социальных сетях видеозаписях видны последствия перестрелки между российскими и украинскими войсками, в результате которой в Сумах были уничтожены российский танк и бронеавтомобиль «Рысь». Похоже, в танк попали из гранатомета — возможно, после перестрелки.,[object Object]

title: Skirmish between Russian infantry and Ukrainian forces
description: Skirmish between Russian infantry and Ukrainian forces. Video footage posted to social media shows the apparent aftermath of an ambush on a likely Russian spetsnaz column in northern KHARKIV. The video footage shows at least four Russian Tigr which appear to have been attacked with small arms in an area close to the centre of KHARKIV. No dead or wounded Russian troops are visible in the footage, Ukraine appears to have lost one BTR-4 and a school appear to have been badly damaged during the exchange. The Russian column appears to be heading north west out of the city.

ru.title: Знімки, опубліковані в соцмережах, показують, що ДНР захопила НИКОЛАЇВКУ.,[object Object]
ru.description: Стычка между русской пехотой и украинскими войсками. Видеозапись, размещенная в социальных сетях, показывает очевидные последствия засады на предположительно колонну российского спецназа на севере ХАРЬКОВА. На видеозаписях видно как минимум четыре российских «Тигра», которые, по-видимому, подверглись обстрелу из стрелкового оружия в районе недалеко от центра ХАРЬКОВА. На кадрах не видно ни убитых, ни раненых российских военнослужащих, похоже, что Украина потеряла один БТР-4, а во время перестрелки серьезно пострадала школа. Русская колонна, кажется, движется на северо-запад от города.,[object Object]

description: Video footage posted to social medi ahows an abandoned Russian Ural-4320 in SUMY while gunfire can be heard in the background. Additional footage from the same site shows a Russian soldier - clearly suffering mentally from the fighting - being surrounded and shouted at by Ukrainian civilians. The presence of Ukrainian militias within this crowd indicates the soldier was taken prisoner.

title: Video footage posted to social media shows the aftermath of a likely Ukrainian strike on a Russian vehicle attempting to cross the IRPIN RIVER
description: Video footage posted to social media shows the aftermath of a likely Ukrainian strike on a Russian vehicle attempting to cross the IRPIN RIVER. A destroyed truck and the bodies of at least three people - likely Russian soldiers can be seen in the footage. The bridge also appears to have been destroyed, this was likely by Ukrainian forces.

title: Skirmish between Russian and Ukrainian troops in OLESHKY
description: Skirmish between Russian and Ukrainian troops in OLESHKY. Video footage published by the Ukrainian Armed Forces shows the aftermath of a firefight between troops from the 11TH AIR ASSAULT BRIGADE and the Ukrainian military. At least four dead Russian soldiers and a damaged BMP-2 can be seen.

title: The Ukrainian Ministry of Defence claims Russian forces attempted to conduct an airborne assault to capture VASYLKIV AIR BASE

The Ukrainians claim the assualt failed and two Russian Il-76 were shotdown during the operation. Janes has not been able to independently verify the shootdown of these aircraft.
